languages.text: "Это не я суровая, это Нэми растяпа. Если бы не я, давно себе резаком руку оттяпала бы или в пробоину вывалилась".
"I'm not strict! Nemi is just sloppy. If it weren't for me, she would have cut her own arm off with a torch or floated out of a breach long ago."
languages.original_text: "Это не я суровая, это Нэми растяпа. Если бы не я, давно себе резаком руку оттяпала бы или в пробоину вывалилась".

traits.locale_text: "It is not me who is strict, it is Nemi who is sloppy. If it was not for me, she would have cut her arm off with a torch or floated out of a breach a long time ago."
"It is not me who is strict, it is Nemi who is sloppy. If it was not for me, she would have cut her arm off with a torch or floated out of a breach a long time ago."
"It is not I who is strict: it is Nemi who is sloppy. If it were not for me, she would have cut her own arm off with a torch or floated out of a breach long ago."
"It is not I who is strict: it is Nemi who is sloppy. If it were not for me, she would have cut her own arm off with a torch or floated out of a breach long ago."
"I'm not strict! Nemi is just sloppy. If it weren't for me, she would have cut her own arm off with a torch or floated out of a breach long ago."
"I'm not strict! Nemi is just sloppy. If it weren't for me, she would have cut her own arm off with a torch or floated out of a breach long ago."

languages.text: "Ich bin nicht streng. Nemi ist einfach schlampig. Ohne mich hätte sie sich längst mit einer Fackel den Arm abgeschnitten oder wäre durch einen Riss in der Außenhaut ins All gezogen worden."
languages.original_text: "I'm not strict! Nemi is just sloppy. If it weren't for me, she would have cut her own arm off with a torch or floated out of a breach long ago."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin nicht streng. Nemi ist einfach schlampig. Ohne mich hätte sie sich längst mit einer Fackel den Arm abgeschnitten oder wäre durch einen Riss in der Außenhaut ins All gezogen worden.

languages.text: « Je ne suis pas stricte ! Nemi a fait preuve de négligence, c'est tout. Sans moi, ça ferait bien longtemps qu'elle aurait perdu un bras à force de manier la torche n'importe comment, ou qu'elle se serait retrouvée aspirée dans l'espace par une brèche. »
languages.original_text: "I'm not strict! Nemi is just sloppy. If it weren't for me, she would have cut her own arm off with a torch or floated out of a breach long ago."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis pas stricte ! Nemi a fait preuve de négligence, c'est tout. Sans moi, ça ferait bien longtemps qu'elle aurait perdu un bras à force de manier la torche n'importe comment, ou qu'elle se serait retrouvée aspirée dans l'espace par une brèche. »

languages.text: «¡No soy estricta! Es que Nemi es muy descuidada. Si no fuese por mí, hace mucho que se habría soldado el brazo con un soplete o habría salido escupida por una brecha en el casco».
languages.original_text: "I'm not strict! Nemi is just sloppy. If it weren't for me, she would have cut her own arm off with a torch or floated out of a breach long ago."

traits.locale_text: «¡No soy estricta! Es que Nemi es muy descuidada. Si no fuese por mí, hace mucho que se habría soldado el brazo con un soplete o habría salido escupida por una brecha en el casco».

languages.text: 「私は厳しいわけじゃありません！ネミがだらしないだけです。私がいなければ、あの子はずっと前にトーチで自分の腕を切り落としたり、裂けめに浮かんでいたことでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I'm not strict! Nemi is just sloppy. If it weren't for me, she would have cut her own arm off with a torch or floated out of a breach long ago."

traits.locale_text: 「私は厳しいわけじゃありません！ネミがだらしないだけです。私がいなければ、あの子はずっと前にトーチで自分の腕を切り落としたり、裂けめに浮かんでいたことでしょう」

languages.text: “我根本不严厉！涅米实在是太粗心大意了。要不是有我在，她早就把自己的胳膊弄断了，或者早就淹死在什么地方了。”
languages.original_text: "I'm not strict! Nemi is just sloppy. If it weren't for me, she would have cut her own arm off with a torch or floated out of a breach long ago."

traits.locale_text: “我根本不严厉！涅米实在是太粗心大意了。要不是有我在，她早就把自己的胳膊弄断了，或者早就淹死在什么地方了。”

languages.text: "Kuralcı değilim. Nemi çok dikkatsiz davranıyor. Ben olmasaydım çoktan gidip meşaleyle kolunu filan keserdi ya da bir delikten uçup giderdi."
languages.original_text: "I'm not strict! Nemi is just sloppy. If it weren't for me, she would have cut her own arm off with a torch or floated out of a breach long ago."
